vlive.korean: 2억 좋죠 저희가 '2YA2YAO!'니까 - 1억... 1억 번 어떻게 언제 눌렀지? I like 200 million. Since our song is "2YAYAO!". - 100 million...How did they press 100 million times? 듣기 View video SMTOWN : [FULL] 슈퍼주니어의 2YA2YAO! LIVE @ SJ THE STAGE
vlive.english: I like 200 million. Since our song is "2YAYAO!". - 100 million...How did they press 100 million times?
